resources.string:
The need for blood is Constant, and because there is no substitute for Blood, Lifeline Blood
Application relies on generosity of everyday heroes like you to make sure there's enough
available to those who need it.
Everyday all around the globe Many lose their lives due to lack of or Delayed transfusion.
Lifeline Blood Application is an Android Operating system based Mobile application developed to Find Donors, In a Critical situation.
